assessmentQuestionVersion.name: HRBPD_Change_AcknowledgementText
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Pre-tax benefit changes are subject to the mid-year election change rules outlined in the benefit summary plan description. I authorize the above pre-tax salary deductions to be withheld from my bi-weekly pay. I authorize deduction rate increases or changes as required by the benefit provider in accordance with the terms and conditions of the benefit policies.
